General.Name: FAP Agri Tbk PT
General.Description: PT FAP Agri Tbk operates as an oil palm plantation company in Indonesia. It is also involved in trading of agricultural products, such as coconuts, palm, and fruit seed oil, as well as vegetable fats and margarine. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Jakarta Utara, Indonesia.
General.Address: Ruko GSA Central Park B8 ED/EE, West Jakarta, Indonesia, 11470

AddressData.Street: Ruko GSA Central Park B8 ED/EE
